alert.note: Alert for Cleburne; Conway; Faulkner; Independence; Perry; Pope; Stone; Van Buren; White; Yell (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 22 at 3:24AM CST until February 22 at 4:15AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Stone County in north central Arkansas... West central Independence County in north central Arkansas... Northeastern Perry County in central Arkansas... Van Buren County in north central Arkansas... Cleburne County in north central Arkansas... Northern Faulkner County in central Arkansas... Conway County in central Arkansas... Northwestern White County in central Arkansas... East central Yell County in central Arkansas... Southeastern Pope County in central Arkansas... * Until 415 AM CST. * At 324 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Elberta to near Blick to near Petit Jean State Park, moving east at 85 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Conway... Heber Springs... Morrilton... Clinton... Fairfield Bay... Greenbrier... Atkins... Greers Ferry... Wooster... Oppelo... Quitman... Guy... Rose Bud... Damascus... Enola... Twin Groves... Menifee... Shirley... Concord... Mount Vernon... This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 95 and 126. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CST for central and north central Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CST for central and north central Arkansas.

area.areaDesc: Cleburne; Conway; Faulkner; Independence; Perry; Pope; Stone; Van Buren; White; Yell
